statements: SELECT * FROM climate_disasters ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT disaster_type, location, severity FROM climate_disasters WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT disaster_type, description FROM climate_disasters WHERE location = 'California' AND severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM climate_disasters WHERE disaster_type = 'Hurricane' AND date_occurred BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT disaster_type, location, date_occurred FROM climate_disasters ORDER BY date_occurred ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_disasters WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date_occurred DESC
SELECT disaster_type, location, date_occurred FROM climate_disasters WHERE severity >= 3 AND disaster_type = 'Flood'
SELECT description FROM climate_disasters WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT disaster_id, disaster_type, location, date_occurred FROM climate_disasters WHERE date_occurred BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC, severity DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_disasters, AVG(severity) AS avg_severity FROM climate_disasters
SELECT * FROM hurricanes;
SELECT name, location FROM wildfires;
SELECT id, name, intensity FROM hurricanes WHERE intensity > 4;
SELECT * FROM wildfires WHERE area_affected > 1000;
SELECT name, date FROM hurricanes WHERE location = 'Florida';
SELECT * FROM wildfires WHERE area_affected > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT name, location FROM hurricanes WHERE intensity >= 5 ORDER BY intensity ASC
SELECT id, name, location FROM wildfires WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM hurricanes UNION SELECT DISTINCT location FROM wildfires
SELECT name AS wildfire_name, location AS wildfire_location FROM wildfires WHERE area_affected < 500
SELECT * FROM hurricanes;
SELECT name, location, severity FROM hurricanes WHERE severity = 'high' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT location, severity, damage_cost FROM floods WHERE severity = 'medium' AND damage_cost > 10000;
SELECT name, location, start_date FROM wildfires WHERE containment_status = 'uncontrolled' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hurricanes UNION SELECT * FROM floods UNION SELECT * FROM wildfires;
SELECT * FROM hurricanes WHERE severity='high' ORDER BY year DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, severity FROM floods WHERE damage_cost > 100000 ORDER BY severity ASC, affected_area DESC;
SELECT name, location, year FROM hurricanes WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 AND severity='medium' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT wildfire_id, location, acreage FROM wildfires WHERE containment_status='uncontrolled' ORDER BY acreage DESC, start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT flood_id, location, affected_area, damage_cost FROM floods WHERE severity='high' ORDER BY damage_cost DESC, affected_area ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hurricanes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM floods WHERE severity='High';
SELECT name, region, acres_burned FROM wildfires WHERE acres_burned > 10000;
SELECT id, action_plan FROM response_planning WHERE disaster_type='Fire';
SELECT name, location, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM hurricanes WHERE location LIKE '%Florida%';
SELECT * FROM hurricanes ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM hurricanes WHERE location='Florida';
SELECT * FROM wildfires WHERE acres_burned > 50000 ORDER BY acres_burned DESC;
SELECT name, severity, affected_area FROM floods WHERE severity='High' AND affected_area LIKE '%city%';
SELECT id, disaster_type FROM response_planning WHERE disaster_type IN ('Flood', 'Wildfire') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM hurricanes;
SELECT name, category, date FROM hurricanes WHERE category > 2;
SELECT location, severity FROM floods WHERE severity < 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildfires WHERE acres_burned > 5000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT disaster_id, type_of_damage FROM damage_assessment WHERE disaster_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM hurricanes WHERE category > 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, category, date FROM hurricanes WHERE affected_area LIKE '%Florida%' ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT location, severity FROM floods WHERE severity >= 5 AND affected_population > 100000 ORDER BY severity DESC, date ASC;
SELECT id, location, acres_burned FROM wildfires WHERE containment_status = 'Under Control' ORDER BY acres_burned DESC;
SELECT disaster_id, type_of_damage, assessment_notes FROM damage_assessment WHERE type_of_damage = 'Structural Damage' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
